item.title: About
item.description: About How to cite? HSF1Base: a comprehensive database of HSF1 (heat shock factor 1) target genes Dániel Kovács 1,*, Tímea Sigmond 1,*, Bernadette Hotzi 1,*, Balázs Bohár 1, Dávid Fazekas 1,2,3, Veronika Deák 4, Tibor Vellai 1,5,# and János Barna 1,5,# 1 Department of Genetics, Institute of Biology, Eötvös Loránd University, Pázmány Péter stny. 1/C, Budapest H-1117, Hungary 2 Earlham Institute, Norwich, United Kingdom 3 Quadram Institute, Norwich, United Kingdom
